item.description:
Originally from Athens, GA, Adam Hearn is a current graduate student studying Data Science for Public Policy at the McCourt School of Public Policy at Georgetown University. As a graduate of Rhodes College (2019), Adam acquired his B.A. in Economics and minor in Computer Science. Adam enjoys studying the intersection of these two disciplines, by using data mining and machine learning to apply econometric models and consequently advance and implement public policy, especially in the field of postsecondary education.

CV can be downloaded here.
